SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: Application User Details
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Abel C. Debela
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL: create procedure dbo.USR_USP_GETAPPLICATIONUSERDETAIL as begin select SRAU.ID ,AU.ID as ApplicationUserId ,LEFT(SR.NAME,30) as SystemRole ,SRAU.DATEADDED as SystemRoleDateAdded ,AU.DATEADDED as ApplicationUserDateAdded ,C.NAME as ConstituentName ,coalesce(AU.USERNAME, AU.DISPLAYNAME, C.NAME, 'Removed') as ApplicationUserName from dbo.SYSTEMROLEAPPUSER SRAU inner join APPUSER AU ON SRAU.APPUSERID = AU.ID left join dbo.SYSTEMROLE SR ON SRAU.SYSTEMROLEID = SR.ID left join dbo.CONSTITUENT C ON AU.CONSTITUENTID = C.ID end
